values.Asgorath: {$goddescr=, the Ninefold Dragon, head deity of dragonkind.(All alignments)}
values.Astilabor: {%moralneutral+2}{%lawful+2}{$goddescr=, Goddess of acquisitiveness, status, wealth. (Lawful Neutral)}
values.Bahamut: {%lawful+2}{%good+2}{$goddescr=, God of good dragons, wind, wisdom, justice. (Lawful Good)}
values.Faluzure: {%chaotic+2}{%evil+2}{$goddescr=, God of decay, undeath, exhaustion. (Chaotic Evil)}
values.Garyx: {%chaotic+2}{%evil+2}{$goddescr=, God of fire, destruction, renewal. (Chaotic Evil)}
values.Hlal: {%chaotic+2}{%moralneutral+2}{$goddescr=, Goddess of humor, tricks, messages. (Chaotic Neutral)}
values.Kereska: {%good+2}{%ethicalneutral+2}{$goddescr=, Goddess of dragon magic and magical creativity. (Neutral Good)}
values.Tamara: {%lawful+2}{%good+2}{$goddescr=, Goddess of life, light, mercy. (Lawful Good)}
values.Zorquan: {$goddescr=, God of the essence of dragons.(All alignments)}
